Name: Inside The Line
About the game: Overview: Drawing The user will have a open canvas that will allow them to draw whatever they want and save it to their device. The user will have different tools to use such as pencils, markers, paint brush, and a plethora of colors to choose from. Coloring Pages The user will have to choose which picture they will want to color and turn it into a masterpiece and save it to their device. The user will have different tools to use such as pencils, markers, paint brush, and a plethora of colors to choose from. In this mode it has a special feature which helps the user color inside the lines to make beautiful art. Learning Numbers Will allow the user to learn how to count from 1 - 10. Learning ABC's This section will have a picture that represents the letter the user will be able to color the picture as well as trace the letter. The user will have different tools to use such as pencils, markers, paint brush, and a plethora of colors to choose from. My game should be selected because it has potential not just to entertain the young brains of this world but it is also educational and our app has this killer feature that gives this app unique qualites.
